typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Fund as string,
		Asset as string,
		GLaccount as string,
		Id as string,
		Src as string,
		Date as string,
		Memo as string,
		Debit as string,
		Credit as string,
		Job as string,
		NetActivity as string,
		EndingBalance as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB select(mapColumn(
		Fund,
		Asset,
		GLaccount,
		Id,
		Date,
		Memo,
		Debit,
		Credit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
SelectSourceColumns derive(Debit_Credit = case(isNull(Debit),'CR','DR'),
		Trx_Amount = coalesce(toDecimal(Debit,18,2,'$###,###.##'),toDecimal(Credit,18,2,'$###,###.##')),
		Date = toTimestamp(Date,'dd/MM/yyyy')) ~> SetDerivations
SetDerivations select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID = Fund,
		Asset_ID = Asset,
		GL_Code = GLaccount,
		Trx_Code = Id,
		Trx_Date = Date,
		Trx_Desc = Memo,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectForTarget
SelectForTarget sink(input(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Databasename as string,
		Roll_Forward_period as string,
		Group_ID as string,
		Attribute_Id as string,
		Origin_id as string,
		Version_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n  FROM [relational].[Asset]\n  WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
DerivedValidationError select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Databasename,
		Roll_Forward_period,
		Group_ID,
		Attribute_Id,
		Origin_id,
		Version_Name,
		validation_error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Group_ID = toInteger(Group_ID),
		Attribute_Id = toInteger(Attribute_Id),
		Origin_id = toInteger(Origin_id),
		Roll_Forward_period = toInteger(Roll_Forward_period)) ~> ConvertStringToInteger
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
ConvertStringToInteger, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalAsset
LookupRelationalAsset derive(validation_error = iif(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID),'Invalid Fund ID or Asset ID',toString(null()))) ~> DerivedValidationError
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		DatabaseName as string,
		Group_ID as integer,
		Attribute_id as integer,
		Origin_id as integer,
		Asset_Offset as integer,
		Version_name as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		DatabaseName = Databasename,
		Group_ID,
		Attribute_id = Attribute_Id,
		Origin_id,
		Asset_Offset = Roll_Forward_period,
		Version_name = Version_Name,
		Validation_Error = validation_error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Date as string,
		Base_Currency as string,
		Target_Currency as string,
		EOM_Rate as string,
		Average_Mon_Rate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
ConvertStringToStagingDataType select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Base_Currency,
		Target_Currency,
		EOM_Rate = EOM_Rate_Converted,
		Average_Mon_Rate = Average_Mon_Rate_Converted
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
GetFirtRowFromAnalyticsFunction derive(Date = toTimestamp(Date, 'dd/MM/yyyy'),
		EOM_Rate_Converted = toDecimal(EOM_Rate, 18, 4),
		Average_Mon_Rate_Converted = toDecimal(Average_Mon_Rate,18,4)) ~> ConvertStringToStagingDataType
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB window(over(Date,
		Base_Currency,
		Target_Currency),
	asc(Date, false),
	asc(Base_Currency, false),
	asc(Target_Currency, false),
	RN = rowNumber()) ~> AnalyticFunctionGroupForexDateBaseAndTargetCurrency
AnalyticFunctionGroupForexDateBaseAndTargetCurrency filter(RN==1) ~> GetFirtRowFromAnalyticsFunction
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		Forex_Date as timestamp,
		Base_Currency as string,
		Target_Currency as string,
		EOM_Rate as decimal(18,4),
		Avg_Mon_Rate as decimal(18,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Forex_Date = Date,
		Base_Currency,
		Target_Currency,
		EOM_Rate,
		Avg_Mon_Rate = Average_Mon_Rate
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		MYOB_Company_Name as string,
		Fund_Name as string,
		Fund_master as string,
		Fund_master_name as string,
		Fund_Parent_Allocation as string,
		Fund_ABN as string,
		Fund_ARSN as string,
		Fund_country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
DerivedColumn select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Company_Name = MYOB_Company_Name,
		Fund_Name,
		Fund_Master = Fund_master,
		Fund_master_Name = Fund_master_name,
		Fund_Parent_Allocation_percentage = Fund_Parent_Allocation,
		Fund_ABN,
		Fund_ARSN,
		Fund_Country = Fund_country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
GetFirstRowFromAnalyticsFunction derive(Fund_Parent_Allocation = toDecimal(Fund_Parent_Allocation)) ~> DerivedColumn
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB window(over(Fund_ID,
		MYOB_Company_Name),
	asc(Fund_ID, false),
	asc(MYOB_Company_Name, false),
	RN = rowNumber()) ~> AnalyticsFunctionGroupFundID
AnalyticsFunctionGroupFundID filter(RN==1) ~> GetFirstRowFromAnalyticsFunction
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Company_Name as string,
		Fund_Name as string,
		Fund_Master as string,
		Fund_master_Name as string,
		Fund_Parent_Allocation_percentage as decimal(18,2),
		Fund_ABN as string,
		Fund_ARSN as string,
		Fund_Country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Company_Name,
		Fund_Name,
		Fund_Master,
		Fund_master_Name,
		Fund_Parent_Allocation_percentage,
		Fund_ABN,
		Fund_ARSN,
		Fund_Country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Allocation_percentage as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
ConvertAllocationPercentage select(mapColumn(
		GL_Code,
		GL_Desc,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Allocation_percentage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Allocation_percentage = iifNull(toDecimal(trim(Allocation_percentage,'%'), 18, 4, '###.##'),0),
		GL_Code = trim(GL_Code, '\'')) ~> ConvertAllocationPercentage
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Allocation_percent as decimal(18,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		GL_Code,
		GL_Desc,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Allocation_percent = Allocation_percentage
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Fund as string,
		Asset as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		{GL Code} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
TrimGLCode select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID = Fund,
		Asset_ID = Asset,
		Status,
		Product,
		GL_Code = {GL Code}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive({GL Code} = trim({GL Code}, '\'')) ~> TrimGLCode
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		GL_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Status,
		Product,
		GL_Code
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Date as string,
		Transaction_Code as string,
		Cashflow_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Description as string,
		Amount as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Start_Date as string,
		End_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n  FROM [relational].[Asset]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetAssetMaster
source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [GL_Code]\n      ,[Category]\n      ,[Cash_Flow_Code]\n  FROM [relational].[Chart_of_Account]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetGLCodes
CheckAmoutNotNull@ValidAmountAndDateAndTrxCode select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit,
		Start_Date,
		End_Date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
UnionAll derive(Debit_Credit = upper(Debit_Credit),
		Trx_Amount = abs(toDecimal(Amount,18,2))) ~> SetDerivations
SetDerivations select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Date = Date,
		Trx_Code = Transaction_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code = Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		Trx_Desc = GL_Description,
		validation_error = Validation_Error,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Amount,
		Start_Date,
		End_Date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectForTarget
SelectSourceColumns, SelectFundColumns lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupFundAndAsset
GetAssetMaster select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectFundColumns
SelectGLData, SelectCOAcolumns lookup(GL_Code == Relation_GL_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupGLcode
GetGLCodes select(mapColumn(
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Category = Category,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCOAcolumns
TrimSingleQuoteFromGLcode select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit,
		Start_Date,
		End_Date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectGLData
LookupGLcode split(not(isNull(Relation_GL_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitValidGL@(ValidGL, NotValidGL)
LookupFundAndAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Fund_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> TransactionValidFundAsset@(ValidFundAsset, InvalidFundAsset)
DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID = Derived_Fund,
		Asset_ID = Derived_Asset,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit,
		Start_Date,
		End_Date,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundAssetData
TransactionValidFundAsset@InvalidFundAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid Fund or Asset'),
		Derived_Fund = iif(isNull(Fund_ID),toString('Invalid'),Fund_ID),
		Derived_Asset = iif(isNull(Asset_ID),toString('Invalid'),Asset_ID)) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund
ConditionalSplitValidGL@NotValidGL derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid GL Code')) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL
DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit,
		Start_Date,
		End_Date,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidGLdata
ConditionalSplitValidGL@ValidGL select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit,
		Start_Date,
		End_Date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidGLdata
SelectValidGLdata, SelectInvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode, SelectInvalidFundAssetData, SelectInvalidGLdata union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
TransactionValidFundAsset@ValidFundAsset derive(GL_Code = trim(GL_Code,'\'')) ~> TrimSingleQuoteFromGLcode
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Amount = toDecimal(Amount,18,2,'###,###.##'),
		Date = toTimestamp(Date,'dd/MM/yyyy'),
		Start_Date = toDate(Start_Date, 'dd/MM/yyyy'),
		End_Date = toDate(End_Date, 'dd/MM/yyyy')) ~> ConvertAmountToValidFormat
ConvertAmountToValidFormat split(not(isNull(Transaction_Code)) && not(isNull(Date)) && not(isNull(Amount)) && not(isNull(Start_Date)) && not(isNull(End_Date)) && (Debit_Credit <=> 'Dr' || Debit_Credit <=> 'Cr') && (Trx_Type == 'Actual' || Trx_Type == 'Actual - Non MYOB' || Trx_Type == 'Actual - Opening Balances' || Trx_Type == 'Year - End'),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckAmoutNotNull@(ValidAmountAndDateAndTrxCode, InvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode)
CheckAmoutNotNull@InvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid Transaction Code / Date / Amount / Debit Credit Indicator / Transaction Type / Start Date / End Date / GL Description too long'),
		Derived_Date = iif(isNull(Date),toTimestamp('31/12/9999','dd/MM/yyyy'),Date),
		Derived_Amount = iif(isNull(Amount),toDecimal(0,18,2),Amount),
		Derived_TrxCode = iif(isNull(Transaction_Code),toString('Invalid'),Transaction_Code),
		Derived_Debit_Credit = iif(isNull(Debit_Credit),toString(''),Debit_Credit),
		Derived_Trx_Type = iif(isNull(Trx_Type),toString('Invalid'),Trx_Type)) ~> DerivedInvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode
DerivedInvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode select(mapColumn(
		Date = Derived_Date,
		Transaction_Code = Derived_TrxCode,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type = Derived_Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount = Derived_Amount,
		Debit_Credit = Derived_Debit_Credit,
		Start_Date,
		End_Date,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode
SelectForTarget sink(input(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		Start_Date_Tag as date,
		End_Date_Tag as date,
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount,
		Start_Date_Tag = Start_Date,
		End_Date_Tag = End_Date,
		validation_error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		UID as string,
		Attribute as string,
		Answer_Number as string,
		Text_Response as string,
		Numeric_Response as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		UID as string,
		SLI_ID as string,
		Ops_Report_ID as string,
		Metric_Group as string,
		Metric_Sub_Group as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [UID]\n      ,[SLI_ID]\n      ,[Ops_Report_ID]\n      ,[Metric_Group]\n      ,[Metric_Sub_Group]\n  FROM [relational].[OPS_Questions]',
	format: 'query') ~> OpsQuestions
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Asset_Name as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Asset_Name]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n  FROM [relational].[Asset]\n  WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> Asset
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		UID,
		Attribute,
		Answer_Number,
		Text_Response,
		Numeric_Response
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
SelectSourceColumns, SelectQuestionKey lookup(UID == Question_UID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LkpOpsQuestionUID
OpsQuestions select(mapColumn(
		Question_UID = UID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectQuestionKey
Asset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Asset_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAssetKey
LkpAsset derive(Validation_Error = iif(isNull(Question_UID)||isNull(Asset_Asset_ID)||isNull(toDate(Reporting_Period,'dd/MM/yyyy'))||isNull(toInteger(Answer_Number)),'Error in UID / Fund / Asset / Reporting Date / Answer Number',toString(null()))) ~> DerivedValidationError
LkpOpsQuestionUID, SelectAssetKey lookup(Asset_ID == Asset_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Asset_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LkpAsset
DerivedValidationError sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		UID as string,
		Attribute as string,
		Answer_Number as string,
		Text_Response as string,
		Numeric_Response as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		UID,
		Attribute,
		Answer_Number,
		Text_Response,
		Numeric_Response,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Certification_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as string,
		{Certifying_Body } as string,
		Certification_Date as string,
		Certification_End_Date as string,
		Certified_Entity as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
source(output(
		Certification_Type_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Certification_Type_Code]\nFROM [relational].[OPS_Certification_Type]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalCertificationType
ValidatedCertificationDandDate@ValidDateAndCertificationID, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,

ConvertDateAndIncidentID split(not(isNull(Derived_Risk_Opp_ID)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && iif(not(isNull(Date_Lodged)),not(isNull(Derived_Date_Lodged)),true()) && iif(not(isNull(Date_Closed)),not(isNull(Derived_Date_Closed)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedRiskOppIDandDate@(ValidDateAndRiskOppID, InvalidDateOrRiskOppID)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Date_Lodged = toDate(Date_Lodged,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Date_Closed = toDate(Date_Closed,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Risk_Opp_ID = toInteger(Risk_Opp_ID)) ~> ConvertDateAndIncidentID
InvalidDateOrRiskOppIDerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Quarterly_Incidents,
		Risk_Opps_Flag,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrIRiskOppID
ValidatedRiskOppIDandDate@InvalidDateOrRiskOppID derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period / Lodged Date / Closed Date / Risk Opp ID")) ~> InvalidDateOrRiskOppIDerrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Quarterly_Incidents,
		Risk_Opps_Flag,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrIRiskOppID, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset, SelectInvalidRiskOppType union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset, SelectRelationalRiskOppType lookup(Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code == Relation_Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalRiskOppType
RelationalRiskOpportunityType select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code = Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalRiskOppType
LookupRelationalRiskOppType split(not(isNull(Relation_Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidRiskOppType@(ValidRiskOppType, InvalidRiskOppType)
IsValidRiskOppType@InvalidRiskOppType derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Risk Type Code")) ~> InvalidRiskOppTypeerrormessage
InvalidRiskOppTypeerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Quarterly_Incidents,
		Risk_Opps_Flag,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidRiskOppType
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Risk_Opp_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code as string,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton as string,
		Actions_Controls as string,
		Date_Lodged as string,
		Likelihood as string,
		Severity as string,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating as string,
		Eliminate_Mitigate as string,
		Residual_Likelihood as string,
		Residual_Severity as string,
		Residual_Risk_Rating as string,
		Future_Controls as string,
		Person_Responsible as string,
		Date_Closed as string,
		Quarterly_Incidents as string,
		Risk_Opps_Flag as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Quarterly_Incidents,
		Risk_Opps_Flag,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit as string,
		Active_YN as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
ValidatedSalesUnitCode@ValidSalesUnitCode select(mapColumn(
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Unit,
		Active_YN
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB split(not(isNull(Sales_Unit_Code)) && trim(Sales_Unit_Code) != '',
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedSalesUnitCode@(ValidSalesUnitCode, InvalidSalesUnitCode)
InvalidSalesUnitCodeerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Unit,
		Active_YN,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidSalesUnitCode
ValidatedSalesUnitCode@InvalidSalesUnitCode derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Sales Unit Code")) ~> InvalidSalesUnitCodeerrormessage
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidSalesUnitCode union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
UnionAll sink(input(
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Unit,
		Active_YN,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[COA_Adjustments]
  WHERE [validation_error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[COA_Adjustments]
  WHERE [validation_error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_ASSET_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[COA_Budgets]
  WHERE [validation_error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_COA_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];
